provisions.title: Section 5
provisions.content:
5.-(1) The seating capacity and the standing capacity of a rural
            service vehicle, as stated respectively in the licence and certificate of
            fitness in respect thereof, shall be clearly marked with letters not less
            than one inch in height inside the vehicle in the mannm following-
                  "Seating Capacity"
                 "Standing Capacity".
                  (2) No person shall use on any road or cause or permit to be so
            used any rural service vehicle which-
                (a) is not marked in accordance with paragraph (1); or
                (b) whilst purporting to be so marked does not have correctly set
                     out the numbers stated in the licence and certificate of fitness.
                     respectively, as the seating capacity and standing capacity of
                     the vehicle.

provisions.title: Section 6
provisions.content:
6. The destination of every rural service vehicle shall be so marked
            both on the front and the rear thereof as to be readily ascertainable by
            day or by night.

provisions.title: Section 7
provisions.content:
7.-(1) No rural service vehicle shall carry more persons seated than
            the number marked therein opposite the words "Seating Capacity" nor
            more persons standing than the number marked therein opposite the
            words "Standing Capacity" in accordance with regulation 5.
                   (2) No rural service vehicle shall carry more persons standing
            than two-thirds the seating capacity as determined in accordance with
            the said regulation 5.
                  (3) For the purpose of reckoning the number of persons carried
            on a rural service vehicle no child under the age of three shall be
            counted, and in the case of children above the age of three but under
            the age of fourteen years three children shall be counted as two per-
            sons.

provisions.title: Section 8
provisions.content:
8. No person shall use or cause or permit any rural service vehicle
            to be used on any road in contuavention of the provisi~nsof regulation
            6 or 7.
